statements: UPDATE customer_preferences SET product_preferences = '{"category": "Electronics", "brand": "Apple"}', purchase_history = '[{"product": "iPhone", "price": 999}]' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customer_preferences SET last_login = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE customer_id = '456e89b0-12d3-a456-4266-14174000e9';

UPDATE customer_preferences SET product_preferences = '{"category": "electronics", "brand": "Apple"}', purchase_history = '[{"product": "iPhone 12", "price": 999.99, "date": "2021-10-15"}]', last_login = '2022-01-25 08:30:00' WHERE customer_id = '0721a484-2c2f-4bfe-b11b-7aeb22f21b0f';

UPDATE customer_preferences SET last_login = '2022-02-08 14:45:00', product_preferences = '{"category": "clothing", "brand": "Nike"}', purchase_history = '[]' WHERE customer_id = '3b5cddb2-1a9d-4152-9c0a-1dc611b452f9';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', age = 35 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_value = 'Winter' WHERE preference_category = 'Season' AND customer_id = 2 ;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@email.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_value = 'new preference value' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND preference_category = 'category1';
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE purchases SET amount = 150.50, purchase_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE purchase_id = 201;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 1001;
UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 50, price = 99.99 WHERE product_id = 2001;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'new.email@example.com', phone_number = '+123456789' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE products SET price = 19.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=price*1.1 WHERE category='Electronics';
UPDATE customers SET email='new_email@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE preferences SET preference_level=4, category='Electronics' WHERE customer_id=2;

UPDATE products SET price = 29.99, description = 'New and improved version' WHERE product_id = 456;
